scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma db push --force-reset && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd backend && npm run test && cd ../frontend && npm run test
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && rsync -avz --delete dist/ your-hostinger-path/
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && npm run build && git push render main
